Class Girl

  • public class Girl
extends java.lang.Object
    Objects of this class are actual girl entities

      int getAttractiveness()
      Returns attractiveness level of the girl
      double getHappiness(java.util.ArrayList<Gifts> giftBasket)
      Calculate and return happiness of the girl, based on her type
      Note For desperate girl, (cost)i - maintenanceBudget turns out to be quite high, so mod 10 is used to contain the result to be in limits of double

      • getHappiness

        public double getHappiness(java.util.ArrayList<Gifts> giftBasket)
        Calculate and return happiness of the girl, based on her type
        Note For desperate girl, (cost)i - maintenanceBudget turns out to be quite high, so mod 10 is used to contain the result to be in limits of double
        Parameters:
        giftBasket - list of all the gifts girl got from his boyfriend
        Returns:
        Happiness of the girl
